findings.title: Non-optimal use of nonReentrant modifier
findings.description: The nonReentrant modifier can be removed to save gas and simplify the code.

findings.title: 6. Redundant using
findings.description: Unused variables indicate bugs or malformed data structures and decrease code readability.

findings.title: Floating Pragma
findings.description: Contracts should be deployed with the same compiler version and flags that they have been tested with thoroughly.

findings.title: Public function that could be declared external
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external to save gas.

findings.title: Deposit function allows using any NTF image URI
findings.description: The deposit function does not validate input properly, allowing users to pass any image URI as an NFT image, which can lead to altered control flow, arbitrary control of a resource, or arbitrary code execution.

findings.title: Tests Coverage
findings.description: The code should be covered with unit tests to achieve 100% coverage with both negative and positive cases, including usage of contracts by multiple users.
